summary: Blondie is an American rock band started in 1974 by Debbie Harry and Chris Stein. They were big in the new wave music scene. At first, they were more popular outside the US, but their third album, *Parallel Lines*, made them famous in America too. They had many hit songs like "Heart of Glass" and "Call Me." The band broke up in 1982 but got back together in 1997. They've sold over 40 million records and are in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. They still perform today.
title: Blondie (band)
